name: CryptoPrice
0:
”Alexa, open Crypto Price.”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Price what is Bitcoin price in USD.”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Price about market value of Ether.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto price
des:
Start Crypto Price, and ask it for the price of either Bitcoin or Ethereum. Crypto Price will provide you with the latest price.
You can ask for the price in either USD or EURO.

Here are the things you can say, once you initialize the skill.

Repeat/Say Again - To hear the last statement again.
Help - To get detailed instructions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
